function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Listen to and learn from community health workers, address contextual factors influencing their work","category":"Raising community empowerment, and allocate resources for capacity building","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Providing training and resources to local organizations, building institutional support, and empowering community leadership.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Addressing power structures, promoting inclusivity, and empowering networks","category":"Investment in improving infrastructure and organization of health care networks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced monitoring of drug resistance and development of new drugs","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough research and testing to adapt interventions to different ecological contexts. implement a flexible and adaptable disease control programs.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Targeted intervention and outreach programs for marginalized groups","category":"Social activities / determinants of health","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Providing targeted education and training on antimalarial drugs, promoting adherence to treatment regimens, and ensuring access to healthcare services for mobile and migrant workers","category":"Investment in improving infrastructure and organization of health care networks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting comprehensive research to evaluate the effectiveness of community participation, implementing evidence-based strategies, and integrating community feedback into program design","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase evidence-base for effectiveness of community participation in malaria efforts","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoid using language that blames specific groups as a source of infection and spread","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing integrated and site-specific disease control interventions, taking into account social-ecological context, local livelihoods, and political for key vector-borne diseases.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expand the focus of disease elimination programs to consider common vectors transmitting multiple diseases in the same communities.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of alternative drying methods or surfaces for virus testing to identify chemical groups that effectively inactivate sars-cov-2","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use alternative eco-friendly pesticides and antifoulants, study the long-term effects of exposure to cuprous oxide","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research on the systemic effects of copper
